member.name: T:Applitools.CodedUI.Eyes
member.summary: Applitools Eyes Coded UI API.

member.name: M:Applitools.CodedUI.Eyes.#ctor(System.Uri)
member.summary: Creates a new Eyes instance that interacts with the Eyes Server at the specified url.

member.name: M:Applitools.CodedUI.Eyes.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new Eyes instance that interacts with the Eyes cloud service.

member.name: M:Applitools.CodedUI.Eyes.Open(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.UITestControl,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Starts a new test that does not dictate the viewport size of the application under test.

member.name: M:Applitools.CodedUI.Eyes.CheckWindow(System.String)
member.summary: Takes a snapshot of the application under test and matches it with the expected output.
member.param: An optional tag to be associated with the snapshot.
member.exception: Thrown if a mismatch is detected and immediate failure reports are enabled.

member.name: M:Applitools.CodedUI.Eyes.CheckWindow(System.TimeSpan,System.String)
member.summary: Takes a snapshot of the application under test and matches it with the expected output.
member.param: The amount of time to retry matching
An optional tag to be associated with the snapshot.
member.exception: Thrown if a mismatch is detected and immediate failure reports are enabled.

member.name: M:Applitools.CodedUI.Eyes.CheckRegion(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.UITestControl,System.String)
member.summary: Takes a snapshot of the specified control of the application under test and matches it with the expected region output.
member.param: An optional tag to be associated with the snapshot.
member.exception: Thrown if a mismatch is detected and immediate failure reports are enabled.

member.name: M:Applitools.CodedUI.Eyes.CheckRegion(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.UITestControl,System.TimeSpan,System.String)
member.summary: Takes a snapshot of the specified control of the application under test and matches it with the expected region output.
member.param: The amount of time to retry matching
An optional tag to be associated with the snapshot.
member.exception: Thrown if a mismatch is detected and immediate failure reports are enabled.

member.name: M:Applitools.CodedUI.Eyes.CheckRegion(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.String)
member.summary: Takes a snapshot of the specified region of the application under test and matches it with the expected region output.
member.param: An optional tag to be associated with the snapshot.
member.exception: Thrown if a mismatch is detected and immediate failure reports are enabled.

member.name: M:Applitools.CodedUI.Eyes.CheckRegion(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.TimeSpan,System.String)
member.summary: Takes a snapshot of the specified region of the application under test and matches it with the expected region output.
member.param: The amount of time to retry matching
An optional tag to be associated with the snapshot.
member.exception: Thrown if a mismatch is detected and immediate failure reports are enabled.

member.summary: Specifies a region of the current application window.
